definition: extortion of money by threats to divulge discrediting information, to obtain through threats; to extort
details:
noun
- extortion of money by threats to divulge discrediting information
verb
- to obtain through threats; to extort
= example: to obtain through threats; to extort
- to exert pressure on someone through threats
= example: to exert pressure on someone through threats
= synonyms: pressure
